title: Rent to Own in Troy. 3 Beds, 1 Baths
posting_body: Available Mid July or Sooner on This Large Unit.
Fridge, stove, Dishwasher, Washer and Dryer.
Painted Walls and Coated Floor in Large Usable Basement.
Great Layout Inside Large Deck and Yard Outside.
Don't Miss Out on This Great Opportunity.
Small quiet Pets Negotiable with $350 per Pet Fee upon Approval.
For  Details & Pics Of This Listing***
